title: I’m Redecorating My Home With These Prime Day Deals
description: From sofas to storage, these finds cover every corner of the house.
byline: Meg Donohue, Tatjana Freund, Sarah Maberry
excerpt: Here are 25 of the best early Amazon Prime Day furniture deals to shop in 2025, with discounts of up to 53 percent off.
text: Nathan James Cohen Mid-Century Modern Bar StoolWoven faux leather upholstery and a solid wood frame lend a mid-century modern feel to this pretty Nathan James bar stool. On sale for under $200, it’s an easy kitchen upgrade that can make a major impact. Customer review: “Amazing quality! They were easy to assemble by myself, comfortable, and very durable.”Purple Plus Mattress (King)If you’ve been eyeing a Purple mattress, Prime Big Deal Days is the ideal time to take the plunge. Right now, you can grab this GelFlex Grid mattress for under $2,000. Customer review: “This is by far the most comfortable mattress I’ve ever slept on. Normally, it would take me awhile to fall asleep due to back issues, but not since I received this.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLittle Tree 47-Inch Round Wooden Dining TableContrasting grain lines add an eye-catching twist to this classic wood dining table. At 47 inches wide, it’s a great pick for small kitchens. Customer review: “Having this table gives life to my home.”Chic House Corduroy Modular Sectional Couch with Ottoman ChaiseThis green corduroy sofa will add a pop of texture and color to your home. The accompanying ottoman lifts to reveal a compartment for spare cushions and remotes.Customer review: “Shipping was prompt, packaging was great, and assembly was a breeze with easy-to-follow instructions.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowTribesigns L-Shaped Computer DeskYour work-from-home setup will be a whole lot more stylish with this elegant desk. Plus, it has ample storage and room for decorative touches. Customer review: “I love my new home office desk. It’s very versatile and just the right size. It took me a very long time to find one with plenty of storage space, the right size, quality and color. I’m so glad I waited to find this one. You will not regret it.”Karl Home Accent ChairFor that lonesome corner in your living room, this gorgeous accent chair will complement nearly any existing décor. Breathable linen cushions are just the cherry on top. Customer review: “Super comfy, easy to put together, took me less than 30 minutes and looks high quality. Would recommend!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowZinus Memory Foam Mattress Nothing will impact your sleep more than upgrading to a first-class mattress. This memory foam option is designed to support your spine and keep you cool all night long.Customer review: “I’ve had the mattress for a few months now and it really has been life-changing. I sleep well, for the first time in years. A good bed makes a difference.”Little Tree Dining Table Hosting dinner parties requires a stunning dining table, and this option is both affordable and timeless. It has a striking, sturdy design and can comfortably seat six people.Customer review: “Very good table, quite comfortable, pretty, easily combines with different types of chairs, and the color allows it to look more elegant.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowZinus Aidan Sling Accent ChairNow just over $100, this cozy sling-back chair will quickly become your new favorite lounging spot.Customer review: “This chair is the perfect mix of style and comfort! The metal frame gives it a modern, minimalist look that complements any space, while the shredded foam cushioning makes it unbelievably cozy.”Mellow Naturalista Classic Solid Wood Platform BedIf you want your bedroom to feel like a personal haven, try this sturdy wooden bed frame. It’ll work with practically any aesthetic, and the platform design means you can store out-of-season items beneath it.Customer review: “GREAT quality! So impressed with the construction, packaging, and everything included to put the bed together.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowNovilla King Size MattressFor hot sleepers who get sweaty throughout the night, this bed will be a game-changer. It’s made of memory foam but still works to be cooling and breathable in all seasons.Customer review: “As someone who’s constantly on the hunt for the perfect night’s sleep, I can confidently say that this mattress has exceeded all my expectations. This mattress isn’t just a place to rest; it’s a true sleep sanctuary that delivers on its promises of cool comfort, pressure relief, and blissful motion isolation.”Martha Stewart Taytum Swivel Task ChairElevate your home office with this sleek task chair, featuring elegant channel tufting and a polished brass frame.Customer review: “It took me 15 minutes to put together and looks great, super comfy and stylish. So glad I bought it!”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowWalker Edison Fluted Buffet CabinetAdd Scandinavian flair—and considerable storage—to your dining or living room with this sleek buffet cabinet from Walker Edison.Customer review: “This buffet came up as a dupe for a much more expensive one that I saw at a designer furniture store. Based on reviews, I took a chance and was not disappointed. I’m very happy with the look and quality.”Walker Edison Andre Solid Wood Dining TableHundreds of five-star reviewers agree that this Walker Edison dining table offers exceptional quality for the price. Made from solid pine wood, the minimalist design can easily blend with almost any decor style. Customer review: “So impressed with the quality of this table for the price! It took about 45 minutes to put together, and I am so happy with how it looks. It’s very sturdy and solid wood on the top.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Choice Products 8-Cube Storage OrganizerThese bins are great to use as drawers, for holding clothes, pantry products, or other odds and ends. Without the baskets, it’s the perfect bookcase or display shelf. Customer review: “Just what I needed! Perfect size, quality is good too. Didn’t take me too long to put it together, and I did it alone. Looks great!”Phi Villa Farmhouse Side Table SetIt’s hard to imagine a home these wouldn’t look lovely in. (Plus, there’s a matching coffee table if you’re interested.)Customer review: “These end tables were exactly what I was looking for! I love having matching tables on each end of the sofa. Great price and easy to build. It only took an hour to assemble both.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowLiving Skog Media Console With a stylish fluted design and plenty of surface space (it’s designed to fit a 65-inch TV), this wooden cabinet is super versatile. Customer review: “Love it! Was looking for a tv console that had a darker wood accent to match our other furniture. I like that the front doors are solid and not flimsy. Definitely took some time to assemble, but that is expected with this type of furniture.”OKD Fluted Coffee Table We’re obsessed with the cut-out shelf in the middle of this oblong coffee table, as well as its gorgeous fluted finish.Customer review: “This table is worth the price! It took a little while to build, but it is nice and sturdy and very high quality. You can fit a lot in the drawer and on the shelf.”Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Choice Products Wicker Egg Chair Here is the perfect comfortable outdoor chair to kick back in and sip on some coffee or mulled wine.Customer review: “I love this chair, my dog loves this chair, my neighbors love this chair. It looks beautiful and has a sturdy structure.”Flamaker Wicker Outdoor Furniture SetThis affordable set can hold its own against any of our favorite luxury outdoor furniture brands. Customer review: “These look great! I thought they were very easy to put together, and the quality seems great. The chairs are wide and seem very durable. I love the look, and it’s so worth the price.”
html:
Nathan James Cohen Mid-Century Modern Bar Stool

Woven faux leather upholstery and a solid wood frame lend a mid-century modern feel to this pretty Nathan James bar stool. On sale for under $200, it’s an easy kitchen upgrade that can make a major impact.

Customer review: “Amazing quality! They were easy to assemble by myself, comfortable, and very durable.”

Purple Plus Mattress (King)

If you’ve been eyeing a Purple mattress, Prime Big Deal Days is the ideal time to take the plunge. Right now, you can grab this GelFlex Grid mattress for under $2,000.

Customer review: “This is by far the most comfortable mattress I’ve ever slept on. Normally, it would take me awhile to fall asleep due to back issues, but not since I received this.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Little Tree 47-Inch Round Wooden Dining Table

Contrasting grain lines add an eye-catching twist to this classic wood dining table. At 47 inches wide, it’s a great pick for small kitchens.

Customer review: “Having this table gives life to my home.”

Chic House Corduroy Modular Sectional Couch with Ottoman Chaise

This green corduroy sofa will add a pop of texture and color to your home. The accompanying ottoman lifts to reveal a compartment for spare cushions and remotes.

Customer review: “Shipping was prompt, packaging was great, and assembly was a breeze with easy-to-follow instructions.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Tribesigns L-Shaped Computer Desk

Your work-from-home setup will be a whole lot more stylish with this elegant desk. Plus, it has ample storage and room for decorative touches.

Customer review: “I love my new home office desk. It’s very versatile and just the right size. It took me a very long time to find one with plenty of storage space, the right size, quality and color. I’m so glad I waited to find this one. You will not regret it.”

Karl Home Accent Chair

For that lonesome corner in your living room, this gorgeous accent chair will complement nearly any existing décor. Breathable linen cushions are just the cherry on top.

Customer review: “Super comfy, easy to put together, took me less than 30 minutes and looks high quality. Would recommend!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Zinus Memory Foam Mattress

Nothing will impact your sleep more than upgrading to a first-class mattress. This memory foam option is designed to support your spine and keep you cool all night long.

Customer review: “I’ve had the mattress for a few months now and it really has been life-changing. I sleep well, for the first time in years. A good bed makes a difference.”

Little Tree Dining Table

Hosting dinner parties requires a stunning dining table, and this option is both affordable and timeless. It has a striking, sturdy design and can comfortably seat six people.

Customer review: “Very good table, quite comfortable, pretty, easily combines with different types of chairs, and the color allows it to look more elegant.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Zinus Aidan Sling Accent Chair

Now just over $100, this cozy sling-back chair will quickly become your new favorite lounging spot.

Customer review: “This chair is the perfect mix of style and comfort! The metal frame gives it a modern, minimalist look that complements any space, while the shredded foam cushioning makes it unbelievably cozy.”

Mellow Naturalista Classic Solid Wood Platform Bed

If you want your bedroom to feel like a personal haven, try this sturdy wooden bed frame. It’ll work with practically any aesthetic, and the platform design means you can store out-of-season items beneath it.

Customer review: “GREAT quality! So impressed with the construction, packaging, and everything included to put the bed together.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Novilla King Size Mattress

For hot sleepers who get sweaty throughout the night, this bed will be a game-changer. It’s made of memory foam but still works to be cooling and breathable in all seasons.

Customer review: “As someone who’s constantly on the hunt for the perfect night’s sleep, I can confidently say that this mattress has exceeded all my expectations. This mattress isn’t just a place to rest; it’s a true sleep sanctuary that delivers on its promises of cool comfort, pressure relief, and blissful motion isolation.”

Martha Stewart Taytum Swivel Task Chair

Elevate your home office with this sleek task chair, featuring elegant channel tufting and a polished brass frame.

Customer review: “It took me 15 minutes to put together and looks great, super comfy and stylish. So glad I bought it!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Walker Edison Fluted Buffet Cabinet

Add Scandinavian flair—and considerable storage—to your dining or living room with this sleek buffet cabinet from Walker Edison.

Customer review: “This buffet came up as a dupe for a much more expensive one that I saw at a designer furniture store. Based on reviews, I took a chance and was not disappointed. I’m very happy with the look and quality.”

Walker Edison Andre Solid Wood Dining Table

Hundreds of five-star reviewers agree that this Walker Edison dining table offers exceptional quality for the price. Made from solid pine wood, the minimalist design can easily blend with almost any decor style.

Customer review: “So impressed with the quality of this table for the price! It took about 45 minutes to put together, and I am so happy with how it looks. It’s very sturdy and solid wood on the top.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Choice Products 8-Cube Storage Organizer

These bins are great to use as drawers, for holding clothes, pantry products, or other odds and ends. Without the baskets, it’s the perfect bookcase or display shelf.

Customer review: “Just what I needed! Perfect size, quality is good too. Didn’t take me too long to put it together, and I did it alone. Looks great!”

Phi Villa Farmhouse Side Table Set

It’s hard to imagine a home these wouldn’t look lovely in. (Plus, there’s a matching coffee table if you’re interested.)

Customer review: “These end tables were exactly what I was looking for! I love having matching tables on each end of the sofa. Great price and easy to build. It only took an hour to assemble both.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Living Skog Media Console

With a stylish fluted design and plenty of surface space (it’s designed to fit a 65-inch TV), this wooden cabinet is super versatile.

Customer review: “Love it! Was looking for a tv console that had a darker wood accent to match our other furniture. I like that the front doors are solid and not flimsy. Definitely took some time to assemble, but that is expected with this type of furniture.”

OKD Fluted Coffee Table

We’re obsessed with the cut-out shelf in the middle of this oblong coffee table, as well as its gorgeous fluted finish.

Customer review: “This table is worth the price! It took a little while to build, but it is nice and sturdy and very high quality. You can fit a lot in the drawer and on the shelf.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Choice Products Wicker Egg Chair

Here is the perfect comfortable outdoor chair to kick back in and sip on some coffee or mulled wine.

Customer review: “I love this chair, my dog loves this chair, my neighbors love this chair. It looks beautiful and has a sturdy structure.”

Flamaker Wicker Outdoor Furniture Set

This affordable set can hold its own against any of our favorite luxury outdoor furniture brands.

Customer review: “These look great! I thought they were very easy to put together, and the quality seems great. The chairs are wide and seem very durable. I love the look, and it’s so worth the price.”
